content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Steam engine at position (0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position (0.5, 0.5))

### Burner Mining Drill at position (42.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position (42.0, -82.0)) with coal as fuel

### Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -83.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest (position (41.5, -83.5)) with an inventory

### Stone Furnace at position (-5.0, -65.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position (-5.0, -65.0)) with coal as fuel and iron-ore as input

### Pipe Group at position (-8.5, 25.5)
Consists of:
- Pipe group (position (-8.5, 25.5)) containing 4 pipes

### Belt Group at position (40.5, -84.5)
Consists of:
- Belt group with inputs and outputs:
  - Input belt (position (40.5, -84.5) to (42.5, -84.5))
  - Output belt (position (43.5, -83.5) to (41.5, -83.5))

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to pick up items
- Ensure that the item you are trying to pick up exists at the specified position before executing the pickup command.

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- The second argument of the insert_item function must be an Entity or EntityGroup. Make sure to pass the correct entity instead of a position.

### Errors when inserting coal into Burner Mining Drill
- Ensure you have coal in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the Burner Mining Drill. Check your inventory status before executing the insert command.
